level.heading: Relation to other law.
level.text: Nothing contained in this chapter shall be applicable to conduct or activity specifically regulated, permitted, or required by any regulatory body, agency, or commission acting under statutory authority of the District of Columbia or the United States.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-169
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-169, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 28-4501.
